stage_2_escalation.title: Land rush
stage_2_escalation.effect: On each board with TOWN/CITY, add 1 TOWN to a land without TOWN.

game_effects.title: Fast Start
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 TOWN to land #3.

game_effects.title: Surge of Colonists
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, put 1 of the State III cards between Stage I and Stage II. (New Deck Order: 111-3-2222-3333)

game_effects.title: Efficient
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage I card. (New Deck Order: 11-3-2222-3333)

game_effects.title: Aggressive Timetable
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage II card. (New Deck Order: 11-3-222-3333)

game_effects.title: Ruthlessly Efficient
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage I card. (New Deck Order: 1-3-222-3333)

game_effects.title: Terrifyingly Efficient
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove all the Stage I cards. (New Deck Order: 3-222-3333)

additional_loss_condition.title: Proud & Mighty Capital
additional_loss_condition.effect: If 7 or more TOWN/CITY are ever in a single land, the Invaders win.

stage_2_escalation.title: Building Boom
stage_2_escalation.effect: On each board with TOWN/CITY, Build in the land with the most TOWN/CITY.

game_effects.title: Indentured Servants Earn Land
game_effects.effect: Invader Build actions affect lands without Invaders, if they are adjacent to at least 2 TOWN/CITY before the Build Action.

game_effects.title: Criminals and Malcontents
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 CITY to land #1, and 1 TOWN to land #2.

game_effects.title: High Immigration (I)
game_effects.effect: Put the 'High Immigration' tile on the Invader Board, to the left of 'Ravage'. The Invaders take this Build action each Invader Phase before Ravaging. Cards slide left from Ravage to it, and from it to the discard pile. Remove the tile when a Stage II card slides onto it, putting that card in the discard.

game_effects.title: High Immigration (full)
game_effects.effect: The extra Build tile remains out the entire game.

game_effects.title: Local Autonomy
game_effects.effect: TOWN/CITY have +1 Health.

game_effects.title: Independent Resolve
game_effects.effect: During Setup, add an additional FEAR to the Fear Pool per player in the game. During any Invader Phase where you resolve no Fear Cards, perform the Build from High Immigration twice. (This has no effect is no card is on the extra build slot).

additional_loss_condition.title: Sprawling Plantations
additional_loss_condition.effect: Before Setup, return all but 7 TOWN per player to the box. Invaders win if you ever cannot place a TOWN.

stage_2_escalation.title: Demand for New Cash Crops
stage_2_escalation.effect: After Exploring, on each board, pick a land of the shown terrain. If it has TOWN/CITY, add 1 BLIGHT. Otherwise, add 1 TOWN.

game_effects.title: Frontier Explorers
game_effects.effect: Except during Setup: After Invaders successfully Explore into a land which had no TOWN/CITY, add 1 EXPLORER there.

game_effects.title: Slave Labor
game_effects.effect: During Setup, put the 'Slave Rebellion' Event under the top 3 cards of the Event Deck. After Invaders Build in a land with 2 EXPLORER or more, replace all but 1 EXPLORER there with an equal number of TOWN.

game_effects.title: Early Plantations
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 TOWN to the highest-numbered land without TOWN. Add 1 TOWN to land #1.

game_effects.title: Triangle Trade
game_effects.effect: Whenever Invaders Build a Coastal CITY, add 1 TOWN to the adjacent land with the fewest TOWN.

game_effects.title: Slow-Healing Ecosystem
game_effects.effect: When you remove BLIGHT from the board, put it here instead of onto the Blight Card. As soon as you have 3 BLIGHT per player here, move it all back to the Blight Card.

game_effects.title: Persistent Explorers
game_effects.effect: After the normal Explore, on each board add 1 EXPLORER to a land without any. Fear Card effects never remove EXPLORER. If one would, you may instead Push that EXPLORER.

additional_loss_condition.title: Land Stripped Bare
additional_loss_condition.effect: At the end of the FAST Phase, the Invaders win if any land has at least 8 total Invaders/BLIGHT (combined).

stage_2_escalation.title: Mining Tunnels
stage_2_escalation.effect: After Advancing Invader Cards: On each board, Explore in 2 lands whose terrains don't match a Ravage or Build Card (no source required).

game_effects.title: Avarice Rewarded & Ceaseless Mining
game_effects.effect: When BLIGHT added by a Ravage Action would cascade, instead Upgrade 1 EXPLORER/TOWN (before DAHAN counterattack). Lands with 3 or more Invaders are Mining lands. In Mining lands: BLIGHT and modifiers to BLIGHT affect Ravage Actions as though they were Build Actions and; During the Build Step, Build Cards cause Ravage Actions (instead of Build Actions).

game_effects.title: Miners Come From Far and Wide
game_effects.effect: <u>Setup:</u> Add 1 EXPLORER in each land with no DAHAN. Add 1 BLIGHT and 1 CITY in the highest-numbered land with a TOWN Setup symbol.

game_effects.title: Mining Boom (I)
game_effects.effect: After the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with EXPLORER. Upgrade 1 EXPLORER there.

game_effects.title: Untapped Salt Deposits
game_effects.effect: Setup: Remove the Stage II 'Coastal Lands' card before randomly choose Stage II cards. Place the 'Salt Deposits' card in place of the 2nd Stage II card. New Deck Order: 111-2S22-33333, where S is the Salt Deposits card. TOWN ignores S.

game_effects.title: Mining Boom (II)
game_effects.effect: Instead of Mining Boom (I), after the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with EXPLORER. Build there, then Upgrade EXPLORER. (Build normally in a Mining land.)

game_effects.title: The Empire Ascendant
game_effects.effect: <u>Setup and During the Explore Step:</u> On boards with 3 or fewer BLIGHT, Add +1 EXPLORER in each land successfully explored. (Max. 2 lands per board per Explore card.)

additional_loss_condition.title: Irreparable Damage
additional_loss_condition.effect: Track how many BLIGHT come off the Blight Card during Ravage Actions that do 8+ Damage to the land. If that number ever exceeds players, the Invaders win.

stage_2_escalation.title: Seek Prime Territory
stage_2_escalation.effect: After the Explore Step: On eah board with 4 of fewer BLIGHT, add 1 TOWN to a land without TOWN/BLIGHT. On each board with 2 or fewer BLIGHT, do so again.

game_effects.title: Migratory Herders
game_effects.effect: After the normal Build Step: In each land matching a Build Card, Gather 1 TOWN from a land not matching a Build Card. (In board/land order.)

game_effects.title: More Rural than Urban
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board, add 1 TOWN to land #2 and 1 TOWN to the highest-numbered land without Setup symbols. During Play, when Invaders would Build 1 CITY in an inland land, they instead Build 2 TOWN.

game_effects.title: Fast Spread
game_effects.effect: When making the Invader Deck, Remove 1 addition Stage 1 Card. (New deck order: 11-2222-33333)

game_effects.title: Herds Thrive in Verdant Lands
game_effects.effect: TOWN in lands without BLIGHT are Durable: they have +2 Health, and 'Destroy TOWN' effects instead deal 2 Damage per TOWN they could Destroy. (To those TOWN only. 'Destroy all TOWN' works normally.)

game_effects.title: Wave of Immigration
game_effects.effect: Before the initial Explore, put the Habsburg Reminder Card under the top 5 Invader Cards. When revealed, on each board, add 1 CITY to a coastal land without CITY and 1 TOWN to the 3 Inland lands with the fewest BLIGHT.

game_effects.title: Far-Flung Herds
game_effects.effect: Ravages do +2 Damage (total) if any adjacent lands have TOWN. (This does not cause lands without Invaders to Ravage.)

additional_loss_condition.title: Hunters Swarm the Island
additional_loss_condition.effect: Put BEASTS Destroyed by Adversary rules on this panel. If there are ever more BEASTS on this panel than on the island, the Invaders win.

stage_2_escalation.title: Stalk the Predators
stage_2_escalation.effect: On each board: Add 2 EXPLORER (total) among lands with BEASTS. If you can't, instead add 2 EXPLORER among lands with BEASTS on a different board.

game_effects.title: Hunters Seek Shell and Hide
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board, add 1 BEASTS and 1 EXPLORER to the highest-numbered land without TOWN/CITY. During Play, EXPLORER do +1 Damage. When Ravage adds BLIGHT to a land (including cascades), Destroy 1 BEASTS in that land.

game_effects.title: A Sense for Impending Disaster
game_effects.effect: The first time each Action would Destroy EXPLORER: If possible, 1 of those EXPLORER is instead Pushed; 1 FEAR when you do so.

game_effects.title: Competition Among Hunters
game_effects.effect: Ravage Cards also match lands with 3 or more EXPLORER. (If the land already matched theRavage Card, it still Ravages just once.)

game_effects.title: Accelerated Exploitation
game_effects.effect: Whe making the Invader Deck, put 1 Stage III Card after each Stage II Card. (New Deck Order: 111-2-3-2-3-2-3-2-33)

game_effects.title: Entrench in the Face of Fear
game_effects.effect: Put an unused Stage II Invader Card under the top 3 Fear Cards, and an unused Stage III Card under the top 7 Fear Cards. When one is revealed, immediately place it in the Build space (face-up).

game_effects.title: Pressure for Fast Profit
game_effects.effect: After the Ravage Step of turn 2+, on each board where it added no BLIGHT: In the land with the most EXPLORER (min. 1), add 1 EXPLORER and 1 TOWN.

additional_loss_condition.title: Trade Hub
additional_loss_condition.effect: If the number of Coastal lands with CITY is ever greater than (2 x # of boards), the Invaders win.

stage_2_escalation.title: Ports Sprawl Outward
stage_2_escalation.effect: (Before Exploring) On the single board with the most Costal TOWN/CITY, add 1 TOWN to the N lands with the fewest TOWN. (N = # of players.)

game_effects.title: Trading Port
game_effects.effect: During Play, ni Coastal lands, Explore Cards add 1 TOWN instead of 1 EXPLORER. 'Coastal Lands' Invader Cards do this for maximum 2 lands per board.

game_effects.title: Seize Opportunity
game_effects.effect: During Setup, add 1 CITY to land #2. Place 'Coastal Lands' as the 3rd Stage II card, and move the two Stage II Cards above it up by one. (New Deck Order: 11-22-1-C2-33333)

game_effects.title: Chart the Coastline
game_effects.effect: In Coastal lands, Build Cards affect lands without Invaders, so long as there is an adjacent CITY.

game_effects.title: Ambition of a Minor Nation
game_effects.effect: During Setup, replace the bottom Stage I Card with the bottom Stage III Card. (New Deck Order: 11-22-3-C2-3333)

game_effects.title: Runoff and Bilgewater
game_effects.effect: After a Ravage Action adds BLIGHT to a Coastal land, add 1 BLIGHT to that board's Ocean (without cascading). Treat the Ocean as a Coastal Wetland for this rule and for BLIGHT removal/movement.

game_effects.title: Exports Fuel Inward Growth
game_effects.effect: After the Ravage Step, add 1 TOWN to each Inland land that matches a Ravage card and is within 1_RANGE of TOWN/CITY.

stage_2_escalation.title: Swayed by the Invaders
stage_2_escalation.effect: After Invaders Explore into each land this Phase, if that land has at least as many Invaders as DAHAN, replace 1 DAHAN with 1 TOWN.

game_effects.title: Heavy Mining
game_effects.effect: If the Invaders do at least 6 Damage to the land during Ravage, add an extra BLIGHT. The additional BLIGHT does not destroy PRESENCE or cause cascade.

game_effects.title: Population Pressure at Home
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 CITY to land #4. On boards where land #4 starts with BLIGHT, put that BLIGHT in land #5 instead.

game_effects.title: Fine Steel for Tools and Guns
game_effects.effect: TOWN del 3 Damage. CITY deal 5 Damage.

game_effects.title: Royal Backing
game_effects.effect: During Setup, after adding all other Invaders, discard the top card of the Invader Deck. On each board, add 1 TOWN to the land of that terrain with the fewest Invaders.

game_effects.title: Mining Rush
game_effects.effect: When Ravaging adds at least 1 BLIGHT to a land, also add 1 TOWN to an adjacent land without TOWN/CITY. Cascading BLIGHT does not cause this effect.

game_effects.title: Prospecting Output
game_effects.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 TOWN and 1 BLIGHT to land #8. The BLIGHT comes from the box, not the Blight Card.
